name: NOVA (bijanstephen)
description:
A young woman remembers what society used to be like before the Earth ran out of water. 

(This game is interactive. Use the scroll wheel to scroll through passages where the spacebar does not advance the dialogue.)

Created for the Prism showcase, a weekend-long residency sponsored by Looking Glass Factory and Housing Works. (This is a 2D build of the project, which was initially created as a hologram.) 

Code: Aaron Bernstein

Art: Katie Mackay

Words: Bijan Stephen
